title: Perseus Rover
text: Meet our rover, Perseus! He's our second rover, building on Artemis to be more robust and capable.

title: 2024 Competition
text: Our team has performed very well at the Australian Rover Challenge, placing fourth in the 2023 and 2024 competitions, and we look forward to competing in 2025!

title: Meet the Team
text: Our team is constantly growing and changing. Making improvements to Perseus requires a range of technical skills and good ideas from our team. If you're interested in getting involved, sign up now!
